template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Forms visible structures like stars, planets, and gas clouds. Components: Protons, neutrons, electrons.

interfaces.name: Baryonic Interaction
interfaces.description: Ordinary matter consists of atoms made from protons, neutrons, and electrons, forming the visible universe. Its behavior is governed by all four fundamental forces.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baryonic_matter, https://www.nasa.gov/audience/forstudents/5-8/features/nasa-knows/what-is-matter-58.html
